item.title: A little rant about System Design
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Imagine you have to design a system for serving blogs to massive readers (10k tps). How would you design the system?

item.title: Binary Search - Simple, but Genius
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Binary search is an efficient algorithm for finding an item from a sorted list of items. It works by repeatedly dividing in half the portion of the list that could contain the item, until you’ve narrowed down the possible locations to just one.

item.title: That one time I got isekai-ed to Binh Dinh Province
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Like countless isekai tales before it, this series has me die to Truck-kun in the beginning. There’s a twist, though: I get isekai’d to Binh Dinh Province.

item.title: Philosophy
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Triết học đánh dấu sự khác nhau của tư duy sinh viên và tư duy học sinh. Đánh dấu một sự trưởng thành ra gì và này nọ của bạn so với việc không học triết. Triết học sẽ giúp bạn làm việc hiệu quả và thông minh hơn. Mình nói như vậy bởi vì: Trong tiếng Anh, triết học được gọi là Philosophy. Nguồn gốc của từ này xuất phát từ hai từ “philo” và “sophia”.

item.title: First post!
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: This is my first post, how exciting!

item.title: About me
item.author: npthinh26012@gmail.com (NPT)
item.description: Yeah, it’s a bit corny but hey, why not ? My name is Nguyen Phuc Thinh, I’m currently a third-year software engineering student in Ho Chi Minh University of Technology. I’m learning to get bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at HCMUT I love exploring and exploiting new knowledge, I do like reading book but never finish them. I love learning Japanese and learning about Japan’s Culture. I grew up in very awesome and supportive family This month (05/2022), I have started my first position as a Software Development Fresher at ZaloPay - a leading Vietnamese e-wallet service - and I’m very happy to share this.
